title: League will not install
body: Please help! After 1% the client will give me a message saying "unexpected error. please check logs to find out issue" ?????? what do i do? Please help!

replies.body:
Running into issues patching at 1% is typically caused by a problem with system permissions. Since League interacts with a ton of files both inside and outside of the League installation directory, it needs proper system permissions in order to do so. Our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) goes over the most common fixes for this and is a great place to start in troubleshooting.

Let me know if this helped fix the issue.
thank you. i got LOL to install
